mapper.sql: id, bill_no, bill_type, biz_type, ref_bill_no, ref_bill_type, original_bill_no, status, buyer_no, buyer_name, saler_no, saler_name, send_date, receive_date, send_store_no, send_store_name, receive_store_no, receive_store_name, sku_id, sku_no, supplier_no, supplier_name, item_no, item_code, item_name, brand_no, brand_name, category_no, category_name, cost, bill_cost, tax_rate, exclusive_cost, send_qty, receive_qty, order_no, balance_no, balance_type, balance_status, is_split, path_no, order_unit_no, order_unit_name, organ_no, organ_name, order_unit_no_from, order_unit_name_from, organ_no_from, organ_name_from, zone_no, zone_name, zone_no_from, zone_name_from, is_bill_invoice, invoice_apply_no, invoice_apply_date,create_user,create_time,claim_no,return_no

B.original_bill_no as original_bill_no,B.BILL_TYPE,B.BIZ_TYPE,B.CREATE_USER, B.BUYER_NO,B.BUYER_NAME,B.SALER_NO,B.SALER_NAME,B.SEND_DATE,B.RECEIVE_DATE, B.ORDER_UNIT_NO_FROM,B.ORDER_UNIT_NAME_FROM,B.ORGAN_NO_FROM,B.ORGAN_NAME_FROM, B.ORDER_UNIT_NO,B.ORDER_UNIT_NAME,B.ORGAN_NO,B.ORGAN_NAME, B.ITEM_NO,B.ITEM_CODE,B.ITEM_NAME,B.BRAND_NO,B.BRAND_NAME,B.BALANCE_NO, B.BRAND_UNIT_NAME,B.CATEGORY_NO,B.CATEGORY_NAME,B.COST,B.SEND_QTY,B.RECEIVE_QTY, c1.category_no one_level_category_no,c1.name one_level_category_name, c2.category_no two_level_category_no,c2.name two_level_category_name, (b.send_qty * b.cost) send_amount, B.IS_SPLIT,B.claim_no,B.return_no
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM BILL_SALE_BALANCE B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON LEFT(B.`CATEGORY_NO`, 2) = C1.`CATEGORY_NO` LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON LEFT(B.`CATEGORY_NO`, 4) = C2.`CATEGORY_NO` WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( (B.BILL_TYPE = 1335 AND B.BIZ_TYPE = '3') OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 2005 AND B.BIZ_TYPE = '35') OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 1361 AND B.BIZ_TYPE IN ('7', '25')) OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 1371 AND B.IS_SPLIT IS NULL) OR (B.BILL_TYPE='1301' AND B.BIZ_TYPE='4') OR B.BILL_TYPE='1333' )

SELECT '合计' SALER_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(B.SEND_QTY), 0) SEND_QTY, IFNULL(SUM(B.SEND_QTY * B.cost), 0) SEND_AMOUNT FROM BILL_SALE_BALANCE B WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( (B.BILL_TYPE = 1335 AND B.BIZ_TYPE = '3') OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 2005 AND B.BIZ_TYPE = '35') OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 1361 AND B.BIZ_TYPE IN ('7', '25')) OR (B.BILL_TYPE = 1371 AND B.IS_SPLIT IS NULL) OR (B.BILL_TYPE='1301' AND B.BIZ_TYPE='4') OR B.BILL_TYPE='1333' )
